resources.string: An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play Services.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"Your Android device isn't connected to a data service. To view this information now, visit %s with a web browser."
By signing in, you are agreeing to the Google Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Google Play Terms of Service.
"Your Android device isn't connected to a Wi-Fi network. To view this information now, visit %s with a web browser."
Let Google check all installed apps for potentially harmful behaviour that might affect the security of your device or data.
Your name is used to personalise your phone and Google services.
Touch any text box to start typing
There was a problem communicating with Google servers.
"Can't establish a reliable connection to the server."
This could be a temporary problem or your Android device may not be provisioned for data services. If it continues, call Customer Care.
This could be a temporary problem. Try again or connect to another Wi-Fi network.
Invalid character. Only 0-9, a-z, A-Z and full stops are allowed.
Google+ makes sharing on the web more like real-life sharing.
"A stream of stuff that you're into"
Connect with close friends and explore common interests.
Back up photos as you take them, with free and private storage.
Enjoy texting, photos and free group video calls with Hangouts.
This can take a few minutes.

"On Google+, you'll have a public profile that helps your friends find you online. Anyone who knows your email address can find and view your profile.
You can use +1 buttons throughout the web to recommend things to the world. Your profile and +1's will appear publicly in search, on ads and across the web.
For now, your profile will show just your name (%s %s). You can add a photo, bio and other details later when you start using Google+."
The administrator at %s owns and manages all your data on Google+ and can delete or modify your profile at any time without your permission.
Provide some basic information for your profile. You can add a photo and other details later when you start using Google+.

"Your photos and videos on Picasa Web Albums will be available on Google+ and your comments will be by %s %s instead of %s. When you share photos on Google+, recipients can reshare them with anyone else. Your albums' visibility settings won't change and you can limit them at any time, so that they can't be reshared freely."
The phone uses your name to personalise some apps.

"If you want this as your Google+ name, our team will need to review it. If it violates our Names Policy, your profile could be suspended. This would limit your ability to use Google products that require an active profile.
"Learn more
"You can't use this name with Google+ because it contains invalid characters."
"You can't use this name with Google+ because it contains invalid characters. Trying to use a nickname, previous name or title? You can add them to your profile after you join."
"This name can't be used with Google+."
I understand, and want to use this name.
This photo will be used in your contact record. You can change it later in the People app.
Take a photo that your friends will see on Google+. You can choose a new picture later.
Your phone is contacting Google to save information to your account. This can take up to 5 minutes.

"Your phone is contacting Google to see if your desired username is available.
This can take a couple of minutes."
"Your Google Account has been created, but your request to join Google+ didn't go through. Try again later from any web browser at plus.google.com."
"Your request to join Google+ didn't go through. Try again later from any web browser at plus.google.com."

Type the text that you see here:
Your Google Account comes with Gmail, email from Google. It works on any device, blocks spam and much more.

"This account has been disabled.
(For details, visit https://google.com/accounts with a web browser)."
This could be a temporary problem or your Android device may not be provisioned for data services. Try again when connected to a mobile network or connect to a Wi-Fi network.
This could be a temporary problem. Try again or connect to another Wi-Fi network.

"Your username and password don't match. Try again.
To recover your account info, go to google.co.uk/accounts/recovery/."

"This account hasn't been verified. Check your email and follow the included link to verify this account.
(To recover your account information, go to http://www.google.co.uk/accounts/recovery on your computer.)"

By continuing, you are agreeing to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, Chrome Terms of Service and Privacy Notice, and Google Play Terms of Service.

"Do you have a Google Account?
If you use Gmail or Google Apps, answer Yes."
Never lose your stuff again. A Google Account keeps everything safe.
Do you want to add an existing account or create a new one?

"A Google Account lets you:
"
See and organise all your information -including your search history - from anywhere."
"
Automatically back up your data, like email, contacts, music and pictures."
"
Use Google services easily from anywhere - including Contacts, Calendar, Maps and more.

"Google+ requires you to use your given name. Your profile should represent one person - not a business, organisation or family - and should include your first and last name in a single language with no professional titles or unnecessary punctuation. After signing up, you can place nicknames or other names with which you're associated in the Other Names field in your profile."
Gathering information about your phone. This could take up to 30 seconds.

"If you ever forget your password, you'll want a way to recover it.
Google provides options for recovering your password via SMS or an alternative email address.
This step is strongly recommended. "Learn more

"Passwords are easy to forget.
Confirm your phone number or backup email address now. This helps you recover access to your Google Content and Google Play Library. "Learn more
Cannot be same as primary email
Error talking to server. Please try again after some time.
If you ever lose your password, you can answer a security question and have a reset link emailed to a different address.
"The email address you have typed isn't valid. Example: joe@example.co.uk"
"The recovery address can't be the same as the one you're creating."

"Use your Google account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data. If you've previously backed up your account, you can restore it to this phone now.
You can change your backup settings at any time in Settings."

"Use your Google account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data.
You can change your backup settings at any time in Settings."
Your phone is contacting Google to restore your account. This may take a while.
Touch to sign in to your account.

You typed an incorrect password or your account has changed. Re-type your password.
access to passwords for Google accounts
Allows apps direct access to the passwords for the Google account(s) that you have set up.
Allows apps to change the displayed name between \"Gmail\" and \"Google Mail\" branding.
These apps want access to your Google account from now on:
This can take a few minutes.
This can take a few minutes.
Use an app-specific password instead of your normal account password.
To access your account, you must sign in on the web. Touch Next to start browser sign-in.
Keep me up to date with news and offers from Google Play.
Allow anonymous location data to be sent to Google. Also allow permitted apps to use data from sources such as Wi-Fi and mobile networks to determine your approximate location.
Let Google use your location to improve search results and other services
Use your Google Account to back up your apps, settings (such as bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) and other data.
Bring apps, settings and other data to this phone that you previously backed up to your Google Account.
Automatically send device event and diagnostic information to Google to help improve our products and protect your device.
"Can't go back to the previous step."
"These services put Google to work for you, and you can turn them on or off at any time. Data will be used in accordance with Google's "Privacy Policy.
"Back up your phone's apps, app data, settings, personal dictionaries and Wiâ€‘Fi passwords" using your Google Account so that you can easily restore later. Learn more
Back up your apps, app data, settings, personal dictionaries and Wiâ€‘Fi passwords using your Google Account so that you can easily restore later.
Data includes apps, app settings, system settings and Wiâ€‘Fi passwords.

"When you turn on automatic backup, your device's data is periodically saved to your Google Account. Backups may include information in your app data folders, like preferences, settings, messages, photos and other files."
"Use Google's location service" to help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to Google, even when no apps are running. Learn more

"Google's location service uses sources like Wiâ€‘Fi and mobile networks to help estimate your device's location faster and more accurately. When you turn on Google's location services, your device enters a mode that uses Wiâ€‘Fi and mobile networks to provide location information. You can turn this off in location settings by choosing a mode that uses GPS only, sometimes called Device only mode."
Help improve location services by letting apps and services scan for Wiâ€‘Fi networks even when Wiâ€‘Fi is off.

"Google's location service uses Wiâ€‘Fi and other signals to determine location more precisely and quickly, often with lower power usage than GPS. Some data may be stored on your device. Data may be collected even when no apps are running."
Keep me up to date with news and offers from Google Play.

Help improve your Android experience" by automatically sending diagnostic and usage data to Google. This information won't be used to identify you and lends a hand to teams working on things like battery life, app performance and new Google features. "Learn more

"This is general information about your device and how you use it, such as battery level, how often you use your apps, the quality and duration of your network connections (like mobile, Wiâ€‘Fi and Bluetooth), and crash reports when things aren't working the way that they should. It will be used to improve Google's products and services for everyone, and won't be associated with your Google Account. Some aggregated information will help partners, such as Android developers, make their apps and products better, too.
You can turn this on or off at any time in the Google Settings app. This doesn't affect your device's ability to send the information it needs to receive essential services such as system updates and security."

"This phone may also receive and install updates and apps from Google, your operator and your phone's manufacturer. Some apps may be downloaded and installed if you continue, and you can remove them at any time."
